title: Cybersecurity Awareness Workshop
description: Join us for an interactive workshop covering the latest cybersecurity threats and best practices. Open to all students and faculty.

title: Penetration Testing Bootcamp
description: Intensive 2-day bootcamp for aspiring penetration testers. Learn ethical hacking techniques from industry professionals.

title: Network Security Conference 2025
description: Annual conference featuring keynote speakers, panel discussions, and networking opportunities with cybersecurity leaders.
